description: This file is a C header file that declares functions for interacting with configuration parameters and instance numbers in a DSL Home Model system. It defines external function prototypes used for getting parameter values of different types and for obtaining instance numbers by index.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueUlong
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value given its name.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueString
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value given its name, output buffer, and size.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueBool
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value given its name.

methods.name: CosaGetInstanceNumberByIndex
methods.description: Gets the instance number of an object by its name and index.
